alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Wakulla, southeastern Liberty and northeastern Franklin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 350 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southwest of Crawfordville to near Carrabelle. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Sopchoppy, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Sanborn, Panacea, Medart, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Lanark Village and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Franklin; Inland Wakulla
